alert.note: Alert for Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 9:27PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Cheyenne County in east central Colorado and southwestern Wallace Counties in west central Kansas through 900 PM MDT... At 826 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Weskan, or 13 miles west of Sharon Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sharon Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland.
